nocolor.#desc: turn off color in spec output

color.#desc: force turn on color in spec output

filter=.#desc: filter specs to run only those that match the given string

helper=.#desc: load helper files that match the given string

require=.#desc: load module that match the given string

failfast.#desc: stop Jasmine execution on spec failure

reporter=.#desc: path to reporter to use instead of the default Jasmine reporter

#desc: marker to signal the end of options meant for Jasmine
